results.title: Funny Doormat Live Love Laugh Leave Doormat, Welcome Mat, Custom Mat, Custom Doormat, Flocked Doormat, Live Love Laugh Mat, Family Doormat
results.description:
The cutoff for Christmas delivery was 12/1. All doormat orders placed after 12/1 will not arrive before Christmas.

Read about the new long lasting FLOCKED method in the second photo of this listing and flocked look is in the third photo.

Please contact us if you have any questions!

General Information:

*Size: 18x30 or 24x36 inches and 9/16 inches thick

*Material: Coir and Vinyl with rubber backing

*Turnaround times: All flocked doormats are ready to ship in about 5-7 business days
Please allow another 3-6 days for shipping once they're made.

*Maintenance: They will live their best life if they are kept out of stormy weather and out of direct sunlight. Lay flat upon opening and shake outdoors to get loose fibers off. These mats do shed a bit.

*Shipping: FedEx. Tracking numbers are emailed to the email we have on file in your order

*Other:  Black ink only

results.title: Live laugh love light bottle,
results.description:
The quote reads:
"Live, Laugh, Love”.

This design can be purchased with any colour of text. Please message with the colour you would like. If no colour is requested your design will be done in black.

There are various light colour choices. 
Choose from the drop down options menu.

My light up bottles are a stunning addition to any home whether its as a gift or a personal buy.

Each one is uniquely designed to suit the individual needs of the customer.

On the outside is your vinyl design or quote which allows the light from within  to glow beautifully and brightly.


If you dont see a design you like feel free to message me with your own design idea.

Gift wrapping is available to purchase simply add this to your cart with your purchase.
Leave a message with your chosen gift bag colour (use photo supplied for reference) and your gift message for your tag.

results.title: Large Live laugh love light block, live laugh love home decor, live laugh love light up gift
results.description:
My glass blocks can be designed to suit any occasion, whether its a birthday, Christmas or  Christening we have a design to suit.

The blocks can be finished with a frosted effect or left plain whichever you prefer.

The ribbon and vinyl colour of the designs are chosen to compliment each other but both can be changed to suit.

 If you would like your design different from the listing photo just message and we can discuss your preferences.

This design is a Quote design which reads
“Live Laugh Love” in a black and gold mirror vinyl with clear lights.
 
The blocks are available in 2 sizes 
Large 7 x 7 inches 
SMALL 5.5 x 5.5 inches. This listing is for A LARGE ONE, small is available in a separate listing.

Please add a contact telephone number in a message in case the courier cannot find your address.

If purchasing from Northern Ireland please look for this option when choosing your shipping option.

Gift wrapping is available to purchase simply add this to your cart with your purchase.
Leave a message with your chosen gift bag colour ( black, aqua, purple, pink ) and your gift message for your tag.

results.title: Men Hairstyling Tool Art Today is a Good Day Motivational Quote Watercolor Print Canvas
results.description:
💕 PRODUCT INFORMATION
Gallery quality canvas print displays vibrant artwork that is built to last. Printed with HP Latex Inks that are fade resistant. Inks are water based and solvent free so rest assured there are no harsh chemicals in your home. Assembled with 3/4" thick wood frame and glued wood core stretcher bars.

All canvas prints are wrapped and shipped in fitted packaging
• Ready To Hang - Mounting hardware comes attached.
• Leveling Bumpers Included - For wall protection.
• Semi-Gloss Print - Increased vibrancy of artwork.
• Beveled Wood Stretch Bars - Make frame less noticeable on front of canvas.
• Industrial Strength Staples - Ensure a tight fit that is sure to last.

💕  How do I take care of returns, exchanges or product issue? 💕 
💕 TRACKING SHOWS ARRIVED
There’s not a whole lot we can do when the tracking info shows it as being delivered. Please check with everyone in your household as someone else might have brought it in. Sometimes we have heard of a package going to a neighbor mistakenly or being left at a different/side door. In our experience, usually the package is located.
Most orders are shipped via UPS Mail Innovations or UPS Surepost, and final delivery is by the USPS so we also suggest having the customer contact their local post office and many times they can get in touch with the actual person who delivered it and see if they recall where they left it. It’s best to do that soon after it’s marked as delivered.
💕 NO TRACKING OR NO MOVEMENT
If a package does not show any movement and has passed the allotted time for delivery we will send a new package at our cost to the customer.  We may ask you to check to very the address or supply us with a new shipping address.
SIZING EXCHANGE
We don't offer exchanges or refunds in those situations.
💕 PRODUCT ISSUE
If it is an issue on our end where we sent out the wrong product, wrong size, bad graphic just send us a picture of what you have  received for quality control purposes and we can offer a refund or replacement once the issue is deemed our fault.
US customers have up to 30 days after the shipped date and international customers have up to 60 days after the shipped date.
What we need to make a replacement order:
1.	Please provide the name and email.
2.	Please provide the order number.
3.	Please provide picture of wrong/ damaged item And Shipping Label.
Once we receive this we will print a replacement product and send it right out!

results.title: Live Love Laugh SVG,  DIY jpg png files, cutting file, gift Love saying quote vector wedding sign house home decoration
results.description:
"Live Love Laugh" SVG, PNG, DXF, EPS & JPG cutting file. Perfect for glass block, frames, and wood signs. It's a beautiful positive saying and makes a lovely gift. Will make a nice addition to your business collection.

Purchase with confidence on how this file cuts.

Shop with confidence

Download contains: 2 each - SVG, PNG, DXF, EPS & JPG
The files are the same font, one is spaced as in the first picture and the other is spaced as in the second picture. This is for convenience only. 

THIS IS NOT A FINISHED PRODUCT. They are cut files with outlines to be used with Silhouette, Cameo and Cricut Design Space. These SVG, PNG, DXF, EPS & JPG cutting files have been tested at the highest quality to cut exactly as shown (without the watermarks).

Electronic Cut file for use with many electronic cutting machine software
Including:
*Silhouette Studio (Versions 2 and 3), (png, jpg, dxf) 
*Make the Cut (MTC), (svg)
*Sure Cuts a Lot (SCAL), (svg, png)
*Cricut Design Space (svg) 

If you are unsure of compatible file formats for your cutting machine software, please convo me for a free test file in all file formats.

Files included in this listing are:
SVG, DXF, EPS & JPG PNG (300 dpi with transparent background)

Cuts great for cardstock, vinyl, htv (iron on). Makes great t-shirts, glass blocks, signs, frames, and other craft projects. 

Please note: NO PHYSICAL ITEMS WILL BE SHIPPED, you are paying for immediate digital download ONLY. 

By purchasing you are agreeing to the following terms and use
TERMS OF USE:
You may use our designs to:
* Make finished items for personal use, gifts, and FINISHED products to sell for profit.
* You MAY NOT transfer, sell, share, alter to sell or share, re-distribute, use in giveaways or freebies, or claim in any way as your own the file/image itself or any part of the file image. 
* Basically, this DIGITAL file is for your use ONLY. Anything you cut with it can be used in any way, but the file itself is not to leave your possession.
* Questions? Please ask prior to purchase. I’m here to help.
* Due to the electronic nature of this listing, there are NO REFUNDS for any reason. Please ensure these file types work with your machine/software prior to purchase. This is ultimately your responsibility. I'm very happy to send you a test/sample file for you to try out free prior to purchase to ensure compatibility.

If you need any help please send me a convo as soon as possible, I'm happy to help. Due to the electronic nature of these files there will be no refunds. I will respond within 24 hours, but most of the time, sooner. I'm happy to help in any way I can. 

Thanks for looking!

results.title: Printable Wall Art, Printable Poster, You Are Loved, Digital Download, Pink Heart, Inspirational Quote
results.description:
This item is an Instant Digital Download - jpg printable 

Please Note:
This listing DOES NOT included a printed image. No physical item will be mailed to you. 

Upon purchase you will receive four 300dpi high resolution .jpg files in the following sizes. 

- one 5x7 inch file 
- one 8x10 inch file
- one 11x14 inch file 
- one 16x20 inch file 

How it Works: 
As soon as your payment is complete you will receive an email (sent to the email registered with etsy) containing a link to your digital files. From here simply download, save, print and enjoy!

Please refer to this link if you are unsure how to download your purchase.
https://www.etsy.com/help/article/3949

Where to Print:
- At home! This is the simplest option. I recommend using heavy-weight             white card stock with home printers. 

- At your local print shop like Staples, FedEx Office or Kinkos. 

- Online printing services work great too like Snapfish! 



Other Important Stuff:
This purchase if for personal use only. Feel free to print as many as you wish to use in your home and even one for as a gift for a friend. 
These images cannot be used for commercial purposes or resold for profit in any form. 



Let's Keep in touch:

email: ragweedwallart(at)gmail.com
Instagram: @ragweedpaper

I love seeing how you style your ragweed wall art pieces, send me pics and I'll love you forever!

results.title: Live Laugh Love Heart Charm & Birthstone Crystal Sterling Silver Necklace - custom colors - Faith Love Hope Also Available- free ship USA
results.description:
This sterling silver necklace features a high quality heart charm engraved with Live Laugh Love, and adorned with a faceted Swarovski crystal birthstone bead. 

The charm is 7/8" wide by 3/4” tall (24x20mm).  The charm is hung on a pretty sterling silver ball chain that is finished off with a sterling silver spring ring clasp.  The chain has a .925 quality mark.

You choose the color of the crystal - a list of crystal and pearl colors available is provided below. 

You can also get Faith Hope Love instead of Live Laugh Love by sending me a note!

===================
NECKLACE LENGTH
===================
Total necklace length as shown in the photos is 18" . You can have the necklace length made to suit your needs. Lengths from 16" up to 20" are available - just select the length you need from the pull down menu. Please be aware: 16” is suitable for girls and petite women. 18” is a women’s average size. 


--------------------------------------------------
CRYSTAL AND PEARL COLORS
--------------------------------------------------
The necklace comes with a Swarovski birthstone crystal or pearl in the color of your choice - I have pretty much every color in the chart. Here is what I recommend for birthstone:
January: Garnet (VERY DARK RED - for a bit brighter red choose "July Siam")
February: Amethyst
March: Aquamarine
April: Crystal (for diamond)
May: Emerald
June: White or cream pearl, or light amethyst
July: Siam or Ruby (Siam is redder, Ruby is pinker).
August: Peridot
September: Sapphire
October: Rose or White Opal
November: Topaz
December: Blue Zircon, Light Sapphire or Tanzanite

I also have small Swarovski pearls in a variety of colors. The pearl colors currently in stock are shown in picture #5. 

Please pick a color from the pull down menu. If you want a color other than found in the menu, choose "Other" and send me a note.

===================
SHIPPING INFO
===================
Ships first class mail. I combine shipping costs when you order more than one item. This is done automatically during checkout - see "With Another Item" for shipping costs for the second item. Shipping within the US takes approximately 3-10 days, and international shipping generally takes 7-21 days (or longer for some countries such as Italy and Brazil). First class mail shipping in the USA is free.

Need Priority Mail or Express Mail? You can now select to upgrade shipping while you are checking out. 

Priority Mail is 2-3 days (not guaranteed) delivery within the USA. 

Express Mail in the USA is 2 day guaranteed (you can get your shipping payment refunded if it does not arrive within 2 days from shipping -- some exclusions apply such as Sundays and Holidays). Express mail is not available for international orders because it is illegal to ship jewelry International Express.

Please note that most orders ship quickly but may not ship the same day as the order is placed. Custom orders may take several days. Orders placed on Friday evening through Sunday morning will not ship until Monday. 


==================
MORE INFO FOR YOU
===================

Want more than is listed as available or want a custom order? Contact me for a reserved listing.

*********************************************************************
ABOUT THE ITEMS IN MY SHOP: All items in my shop are handmade by me, in Oregon, USA.  I am happy to customize your order, just start up a conversation with me.  I use high quality supplies to make my items and I stand behind my products. If you are not satisfied, you may return any unworn item within 2 weeks of receipt. See the return policies in my Shop Policies section. 
*********************************************************************
GIFT WRAPPING: All items come ready to give as a gift in their own pretty organza gift bag inside a lovely gold paper covered box. The box is held shut by a delicate satin bow. Gift notes can be included free of charge upon request. Invoices/receipts are not included unless a special request is made for one. For international orders, anti tarnish tissue paper is sometimes substituted for the organza bag (due to longer transit times). Need a note included? Please let me know and I'll be happy to do so. If this is going as a gift straight to the recipient, let me know!
*********************************************************************

PAYMENT: I accept Paypal and Credit Cards. USA customers can also pay by check or money order - but please be aware this adds up to 2 weeks to order turn around time. (International buyers, please use Paypal or Credit Card).  You do not need a PayPal account to check out with PayPal, just a valid credit card or debit card. 

*********************************************************************
RECEIPTS: I no longer include receipts with my shipments. If you need a receipt, let me know!
*********************************************************************

PRODUCT PHOTOS: Please keep in mind that photos on your screen do not show actual size of items. Jewelry and accessories are photographed close-up and may look larger (or smaller) than they are. Refer to item description for sizes and more information.  Also monitors do vary in their representation of colors.

*********************************************************************

INTERNATIONAL CUSTOMERS (Outside USA): You are responsible for any customs or import fees your country charges. I do not pay these fees (and in fact it is not possible for me to do so). Many customers will not be charged customs, but if you are, it is your responsibility to pay them. UK customers and some EEU customers are likely to incur fees. Please take this into consideration when purchasing. International orders are shipped via insured mail, so the full value of the item must be declared on the package.
 
♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡
THE END: Have a great day!  
♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡

ATTENTION UK CUSTOMERS: If you buy goods online from outside the EU for delivery to the UK, you’ll have to pay Customs Duty (if over £120 value) and Import VAT (if over £18) based on the value of the purchased item. Customs Duty is waived if the amount of the calculated duty payable is £7 or less. Please note there is also an £8 Parcel Force Fee for collecting the Import VAT.  Import VAT is around 20% of the value of the item in Pounds. Marking the item as a gift does not help - the VAT and Postal Force Fee will be charged regardless. Please note that I do not refund any import fees or other fees/taxes charged by foreign countries for import duties.  Please refer to the following website for more information: https://www.gov.uk/goods-sent-from-abroad

results.title: Wooden Sign Live Laugh Love Sign - 11"x60" - Rustic Decor Farmhouse Style Wooden Pallet Sign (Item - PWS014)
results.description:
This LIVE LAUGH LOVE Sign is an elegantly painted sign that adds an element of charm to any home. Great for hanging on the wall or placing above a bed. This sign is pictured above in Dark walnut stain with white paint. 

The dimensions of the sign is roughly 11 inches high and 60 inches wide. Each piece of wood has its own unique characteristics. Therefore it could have additional knots or nail holes, or it might be a different shade than what is pictured. I take great pride in everything I do and will only use the best pieces to deliver the best product to you. If the color or look of your sign is very important, please send me a message and let me know. Since all my orders are constructed after purchase, I can forward you a picture prior to shipment to verify its look. If you would like to do that, just send me a message at check out and I would be happy to do that for you.

Sign can be purchased either natural Pallet wood or it can be stained. The color options for the stain are Golden Oak, Golden Pecan, White Wash, Classic Grey, Dark Walnut or Ebony. Please select desired stain and paint color when you add to your cart. 

I love what I do and I want nothing more than for you to love it too. If, for any reason, you are not happy with the item you receive, please let me know as soon as possible and we will work to make things right. 

If you would like to view the entire shop: www.etsy.com/shop/ItIsAllInTheDetails

results.title: Live Laugh Love Decorated Cookies Words To Live By Cookies
results.description:
Listing is for one dozen (12) Live Laugh Love Cookies

You will receive:

4 Decorated "Live" Flower Cookies
4 Decorated "Laugh" Smiling Face Cookies
4 Decorated "Love" Heart Cookies

**NOTE: All of the cookies are square with scalloped edges, the flower, smiling face, and heart refer to the design on each cookie, not to the shape of the cookie itself**


Please leave your event date in note to seller during checkout. If a date is not included, your order will be shipped within two weeks of purchase, or as soon as our schedule allows.
******************************************************************************
If you need additional cookies please message us before checking out so that we can put up a special listing for you. 

Flavor choices include our signature vanilla sugar cookie or lemon sugar cookie. (**Please note your flavor preference in note to seller at checkout**) Each cookie is hand decorated with our signature tinted vanilla icing.

All cookies are MADE-TO-ORDER to ensure quality and freshness. Each cookie is hand designed and decorated, so some slight variation from the listed photo is to be expected.

Cookies stay fresh 10 days - 2 weeks when kept original packaging. 

******************************************************************************
RUSH ORDERS: If you need cookies in less than two weeks, please message us before purchase to insure that we can fit you into the schedule. A 15% rush fee will be applied to all orders that are needed in less than 12 days. 

******************************************************************************
SHIPPING/PACKAGING: Cookies are individually wrapped, placed in a box with tissue paper, then packed with bubble wrap in a shipping box.

Extreme care is taken in packaging the cookies for the safest delivery possible. As such, Dazzling Sweet Treats cannot be responsible for any breakage or damage that may occur during shipping. We cannot control what happens to the cookies once they leave our hands. 

Cookies are shipped ONLY WITHIN THE UNITED STATES via USPS Priority Mail. Cookies are shipped approximately 5 days prior to your event/desired date to insure they arrive on time. Delivery dates are NOT guaranteed. 

******************************************************************************
FOOD ALLERGIES: Ingredient labels will be included with cookies. If you have any food allergies or special dietary needs, please contact us prior to purchasing so that we may work with you to accommodate your requests.

All sales are final.
